tool_description: Full-Text Content RSS API has the capability to extract article content from a webpage and convert partial web feeds into full-text feeds.  Retrieve results in either JSON, RSS or DICT format.
name: Full-Text Content RSS API
title: Full-Text Content RSS API

api_list.name: Extract Single Post
Extract RSS Feed
api_list.description: Convert partial web feeds into full-text feeds

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: type json, xml or dict format
